editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-7r፡ Prayer to Mary including a review of martyrs -15v: Prayer of Moses which saved him from Pharoah, ጸሎተ፡ ሙሴ።, Cf. EMML 4106 (X: 43), IES 4239. F-77v: Ardǝ’t. See Book of Disciples. መጽሐፈ፡ አርድእት፡. Enno Littmann, “Arde`et: The Magic Book of the Disciples.” JAOS 25 (1904) 1–48, arranged in sections (f-19v; 19v-21v; 21v-27v; 27v-31r; 31r-33v (regarding Psalms); 33v-35r(regarding Psalms); 35r-43r (regarding the owner); 43r-50r (regarding Mary); 50r-52v (regarding Mary); 52v-57r; 57v-61r; 61r-64v; 64v-66v; 67r-68r; 68r-71r; 71r-73r; 73r-76r; 76r-77v. Some of the sections are marked in later hands and different colors of ink for the days of the week: Monday (52v), Tuesday (57v), Wednesday (), Thursday (), Friday (f and 71r), Saturday (, covered by miniature), Sunday (). F-78v: Image of Saint George, Mälk‘a Giyorgis, መልክአ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡. Not listed in Répertoire. EMIP 240, incipit: ተማኅፀንኩ: በቀዊሞትከ: በቅድመ: ዱድያኖስ: ንጉሥ: . ., incomplete at the end. F-84r: Office Prayers, Kidan za-nagh, ኪዳን፡ ዘነግህ፡, arranged for the parts of the day: morning (), midday (), and evening (). . Magnificat. F-86v: Image of the Savior of the World, Mälk‘a Mädḫane Aläm, መልክአ፡ መድኃኔ፡ ዓለም፡. Répertoire 164. F and passim mention the owner, ሀብተ ማርያም. F and passim, mention another original owner, ወልደ ሃይማኖት.
